title: Crystal Gemstone Chakra Energy Jewelry From Balanced Optimist
description: Balanced Optimist offers handmade essential oil gemstone energy bracelets and gifts to help you live a more positive and balanced life filled with love and peace. Every bracelet is handmade in the USA with 100% authentic gemstones and crystals. 8% of all purchases are donated to charities supporting the environment.
cleaned_text: Live with Intent Sometimes the smallest reminders have the largest impact. Balanced Optimist bracelets are meant to remind each of us to live our best life, find our balance, chase our dreams, and experience life to the fullest. Handcrafted with Love and Kindness Each bracelet is one of a kind and designed to maximize the unique power of the incorporated crystals.
